subject: Added a page on my site (Tech Info)
author: Urkel23
full_text:
This is for anyone that would like to try this themselves. With the help of my
friend chris, we were able to get all the information out to the public
including the parts list. Any questions, feel free to email me at any time. I
am available for tech support.

http://www.stevehultay.com/buildyourownbox.html

-Steve H.
